Q. Operations(start/stop/reboot) timed out.Is there a solution?

Answer

HyClops uses Zabbix GlobalScript feature for operation of start/stop/reboot. Zabbix GlobalScript is executed by Zabbix Frontend. So,you should change timeout settings in Zabbix frontend configuration.

Please check the following settings.

(Zabbix_frontend_directory]/include/defines.inc.php

define('ZBX_SCRIPT_TIMEOUT',            60); // in seconds

Default settings is 60 seconds.

Back to FAQ list
